channel.title: Adding shops to Dragon history source
channel.description:
Well i think dragon history source is pretty sweet... i just wanted to add a new shop... i tried looking up some tutorials and most of them said to go into client.java and search for "zeke" or "wanneshop"... im assuming they do this because they need to justify the npc as a shop. when i search for either of those in my client.java, they do not come up...
So what file do i look in to find all the npcs that are shops so i can add a new one?

So what file do i look in to find all the npcs that are shops so i can add a new one?
